org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io

类 BufferSpiller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io.BufferSpiller

  • @Internal
public class BufferSpiller
extends java.lang.Object
    The buffer spiller takes the buffers and events from a data stream and adds them to a spill file. After a number of elements have been spilled, the spiller can "roll over": It presents the spilled elements as a readable sequence, and opens a new spill file.

    This implementation buffers data effectively in the OS cache, which gracefully extends to the disk. Most data is written and re-read milliseconds later. The file is deleted after the read. Consequently, in most cases, the data will never actually hit the physical disks.

    IMPORTANT: The SpilledBufferOrEventSequences created by this spiller all reuse the same reading memory (to reduce overhead) and can consequently not be read concurrently.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  BufferSpiller.SpilledBufferOrEventSequence
      This class represents a sequence of spilled buffers and events, created by the BufferSpiller.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private long bytesWritten
      The number of bytes written since the last roll over.
      private java.nio.channels.FileChannel currentChannel
      The channel of the file we currently spill to.
      private java.io.File currentSpillFile
      The file that we currently spill to.
      private static java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger DIRECTORY_INDEX
      The counter that selects the next directory to spill into.
      private int fileCounter
      A counter, to created numbered spill files.
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer headBuffer
      The buffer that encodes the spilled header.
      (专用程序包) static int HEADER_SIZE
      Size of header in bytes (see add method).
      private int pageSize
      The page size, to let this reader instantiate properly sized memory segments.
      private static int READ_BUFFER_SIZE
      The size of the buffer with which data is read back in.
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer readBuffer
      The buffer used for bulk reading data (used in the SpilledBufferOrEventSequence).
      private java.nio.ByteBuffer[] sources
      The reusable array that holds header and contents buffers.
      private java.lang.String spillFilePrefix
      The name prefix for spill files.
      private java.io.File tempDir
      The directories to spill to.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BufferSpiller

        public BufferSpiller(IOManager ioManager,
                     int pageSize)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new buffer spiller, spilling to one of the I/O manager's temp directories.
        参数:
        ioManager - The I/O manager for access to teh temp directories.
        pageSize - The page size used to re-create spilled buffers.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the temp files for spilling cannot be initialized.

    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        public void add(BufferOrEvent boe)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a buffer or event to the sequence of spilled buffers and events.
        参数:
        boe - The buffer or event to add and spill.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the buffer of event could not be spilled.

      • rollOver

        public BufferSpiller.SpilledBufferOrEventSequence rollOver()
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Starts a new sequence of spilled buffers and event and returns the current sequence of spilled buffers for reading. This method returns null, if nothing was added since the creation of the spiller, or the last call to this method.

        NOTE: The SpilledBufferOrEventSequences created by this method all reuse the same reading memory (to reduce overhead) and can consequently not be read concurrently with each other. To create a sequence that can be read concurrently with the previous SpilledBufferOrEventSequence, use the rollOverWithNewBuffer() method.

        返回:
        The readable sequence of spilled buffers and events, or 'null', if nothing was added.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the readable sequence could not be created, or no new spill file could be created.

      • rollOverWithNewBuffer

        public BufferSpiller.SpilledBufferOrEventSequence rollOverWithNewBuffer()
                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Starts a new sequence of spilled buffers and event and returns the current sequence of spilled buffers for reading. This method returns null, if nothing was added since the creation of the spiller, or the last call to this method.

        The SpilledBufferOrEventSequence returned by this method is safe for concurrent consumption with any previously returned sequence.

        返回:
        The readable sequence of spilled buffers and events, or 'null', if nothing was added.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the readable sequence could not be created, or no new spill file could be created.

      • rollOverInternal

        private BufferSpiller.SpilledBufferOrEventSequence rollOverInternal(boolean newBuffer)
                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Cleans up the current spilling channel and file.

        Does not clean up the SpilledBufferOrEventSequences generated by calls to rollOver().

        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if channel closing or file deletion fail.

      • getBytesWritten

        public long getBytesWritten()
        Gets the number of bytes written in the current spill file.
        返回:
        the number of bytes written in the current spill file
